author: Odeinoichus
title: Kickboxers use gloves? Who knew?
review:
Set #71013 Kickboxer: Another use for those boxing gloves, instead of being an ordinary female boxer this one is a Kickboxer, however it's clear she's meant to be the counterpart to the male from Series 5.

With dual-molded legs to show her wearing white shorts with red boots, there's a lot of great dual-sided printing for her torso and some side-printing on her legs to show the shorts. She has bare arms and a brown ponytail headpiece which we've seen many times before in past CMF Series. She also has a dual-sided facial print, one is smiling and ready to start, the other is determined covered in sweat as she's exerting herself in physical combat.

Extra accessories include an extra protective head piece and a cylinder piece to attach it to when not in use. Overall this one's not very bad, in fact she's pretty great, however I will note that she may not be one of the most sought after despite her parts being good for gym goers in LEGO City MOCs.
